item.name: Control CPU Usage (5 sec)
item.description:
A10-AX-MIB::axSysAverageControlCpuUsage
The average control CPU usage in last 5 seconds.

item.name: CPU Usage (5 sec)
item.description:
A10-AX-MIB::axSysAverageCpuUsage
The average CPU usage in last 5 seconds.

item.name: Data CPU Usage (5 sec)
item.description:
A10-AX-MIB::axSysAverageDataCpuUsage
The average data CPU usage in last 5 seconds.

item.name: Free Disk Space
item.description:
A10-AX-MIB::axSysDiskFreeSpace
The free space of the disk in MB.

item.name: Status of Left or Lower Power Supply
Status of Right or Upper Power Supply
System Temperature
item.description:
A10-AX-MIB::axSysHwPhySystemTemp
The physical system temperature in Celsius.

item.name: Total Disk Space
item.description:
A10-AX-MIB::axSysDiskTotalSpace
The total space of the disk in MB.

item_prototype.name: Status of "$1" FAN
item_prototype.description:
A10-AX-MIB::axFanStatus
Fan status: 0: Failed, 4: OK-fixed/high, 5: OK-low/med, 6: OK-med/med, 7: OK-med/high, -2: not ready, -1: unknown.

discovery_rule.name: Power Supply Voltage Discovery
discovery_rule.description:
A10-AX-MIB::axPowerSupplyVoltageDescription
The description of the system power supply voltage.

item_prototype.name: Status of Power Supply Voltage "$1"
item_prototype.description:
A10-AX-MIB::axPowerSupplyVoltageStatus
The status of the indexed system power supply voltage. This is only supported for the platform where the sensor data is available.

trigger.name: Free disk space is less than 20%
